data.title: Ancestors and Family of Bo & Mary Lou Hagen John Marvin Daughtrey
data.text:
Family Links

Spouses/Children:

Pauline Virginia Frias

John Marvin Daughtrey

Born: 14 Sep 1910, Norfolk City, Virginia

Marriage: Pauline Virginia Frias on 3 Jan 1943 in Norfolk City, VA

Died: 29 Sep 1982, Norfolk City, Virginia at age 72

Buried: Riverside Memorial Park Cemetery, Norfolk, Virginia

Cause of his death was Cardio Pulmonary Arrest / Carcinoma of the Pancreas with Metastasis.

General Notes:

John Marvin Daughtrey [John M Daughtry] and his brother William Herman Daughtrey [W Herman Daughtry] form a business together as Daughtry Brothers. They are listed as living at 2528 Harrell av in the 1935 Norfolk City Directory. [William Herman is listed with his wife, Lorraine]

W Herman (Lorraine) Daughtry slsmn h2528 Harrell av

Wil H Daughtry (Daughtry Bros) hr2528 Harrell av

John M Daughtry (Daughtry Bros) h2528 Harrell av

Medical Notes:

Virginia, Death Records, 1912-2014

Name: John Marvin Daughtry

Residence: 223 S. Blake Rd, Norfolk, VA

Occupation: Grocer, Russo & Mastraco

Gender: Male

Race: White

Age at Death: 72

Birth Date: 14 Sep 1910

Death Date: 29 Sep 1982

Death Place: DePaul Hospital, Norfolk, Virginia

Burial: Cremation - Colonial Crematorium, Norfolk, VA

Registration Date: 6 Oct 1982

Father: Walter T Daughtry

Mother: Lillian Daughtrey

Spouse: Pauline V Daughtry

Military Status: none

Informant: Mary M. Daughtrey

John married Pauline Virginia Frias on 3 Jan 1943 in Norfolk City, VA. (Pauline Virginia Frias was born on 27 Apr 1914 in Camden Co., NC, died on 14 Jun 1982 in Norfolk City, VA and was buried in Riverside Memorial Park Cemetery, Norfolk, Virginia.) The cause of her death was Cancer of the Lung.
